files.patch:
@@ -758,5 +758,5 @@ - *

  • In Perl, free-spacing mode (comments mode in this - * class) denoted by {@code (?x)} will not ignore whitespace inside of - * character classes. In this class, whitespace inside of character classes - * must be escaped to be considered as part of the regular expression when in - * comments mode.

    • + *

  • In Perl, free-spacing mode (which is called comments + * mode in this class) denoted by {@code (?x)} will not ignore whitespace + * inside of character classes. In this class, whitespace inside of character + * classes must be escaped to be considered as part of the regular expression + * when in comments mode.

    • @@ -825,1 +825,3 @@ - * with {@code #} are ignored until the end of a line. + * with {@code #} are ignored until the end of a line. Comments mode ignores + * whitespace within a character class contained in a pattern string. Such + * whitespace must be escaped in order to be considered significant.

    @@ -830,3 +832,0 @@ - *

    Note that comments mode ignores whitespace within a character class - * contained in a pattern string. Such whitespace needs to be escaped - * in order to be treated as if comments mode were not enabled.
